statements: UPDATE seed_distribution SET crop_performance = 'Good' WHERE id = 'a9c08518-34e7-4d28-b951-087c5fa54b5f';
UPDATE seed_distribution SET farmer_id = '3a82f9ff-c2eb-4092-8a44-eb200e34b911', distribution_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE seed_name = 'Wheat';
UPDATE seed_distribution SET crop_performance = 'Excellent' WHERE id = 'e3b52b21-651b-4a62-9a7c-fd4e95b34f1e';
UPDATE seed_distribution SET seed_name = 'Corn', farmer_id = 'a7acf19d-6d8d-4731-8d6f-aa67cace4f41' WHERE id = 'c20ef7b6-030b-4c59-831e-2e230dfb0e24';
UPDATE Distribution SET distributor_location='New Warehouse' WHERE distributor_id=1001;
UPDATE CropPerformance SET crop_yield=350.75 WHERE farmer_id=2003;
UPDATE Distribution SET distributor_location='New Location', seed_type='Improved Seeds' WHERE distributor_id=1;
UPDATE CropPerformance SET crop_yield=500.75, crop_health='Excellent' WHERE farmer_id=3;
UPDATE Farmers SET location = 'New Location' WHERE farmer_id = 'dbeed915-e6b0-47c5-9eee-0a7c5138a086';
UPDATE Seeds SET quantity = 1000, seed_name = 'New Seed' WHERE seed_id = '6c8c0d76-7eec-4431-a07f-1ceb16b07a4c';
UPDATE Farmers SET location = 'New Location' WHERE farmer_name = 'John Doe';

UPDATE CropPerformance SET yield = 100, quality_rating = 4.5 WHERE farmer_id = (SELECT farmer_id FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_name = 'Jane Smith') AND seed_id = (SELECT seed_id FROM Seeds WHERE seed_name = 'Corn');
UPDATE farmers SET location='New Location', crop_type='Wheat' WHERE farmer_id=1;
UPDATE seeds SET supplier='Farmers Co.', expiration_date='2024-12-31' WHERE seed_id=3;
UPDATE farmers SET location='NewLocation', crop_type='Organic' WHERE farmer_id=1;
UPDATE seeds SET supplier='NewSupplier', expiration_date='2023-12-31' WHERE seed_id=3;
UPDATE farmers SET farmer_location = 'California' WHERE farmer_id = 1;
UPDATE distribution SET quantity = 100 WHERE distribution_id = 3;
UPDATE farmers SET farmer_name = 'John Doe', farmer_location = 'Farmville' WHERE farmer_id = 1;
UPDATE crop_performance SET disease_occurrence = TRUE, crop_yield = 25.5, harvest_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE distribution_id = 3;
